critical_architectural_issues.title: Duplicate Organization Directory

critical_architectural_issues.title: Automation Package Outside Workspace
critical_architectural_issues.description: .automation/ has own package.json but is excluded from pnpm workspace
critical_architectural_issues.issue: Separate Node environment, dependencies not managed by pnpm workspace
critical_architectural_issues.impact: Duplicate Node modules, inconsistent versions, harder to maintain
critical_architectural_issues.recommendation: Either include in workspace or remove and migrate to alaweimm90/

critical_architectural_issues.recommendation: Update all script paths from .governance/ to .metaHub/governance/

critical_architectural_issues.title: Missing Package.json in Workspace Directories

conclusion.monorepo_health: MODERATE - Functional but with significant architectural issues
primary_concerns: Multiple duplicate and legacy directories not properly cleaned
Package.json incompatibilities that will cause installation failures
Large portions of build/governance scripts broken due to path mismatches
Unclear workspace package definitions and boundaries
conclusion.recommended_action: Address P0-P1 issues immediately (1-2 days), then plan short-term refactoring (1-2 weeks)
success_criteria: All npm install commands succeed with compatible versions
All governance scripts execute without errors
Clear workspace package structure with consistent configuration
Automated validation prevents future path/version issues
